entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
